text: Great achievements have been made in the isolation of neutralizing mAbs in the past few years using various technology platforms ( Figure 3 ). Up till now, more than 20 mAbs, most of which are human or humanized antibodies, have been described by scientists from all over the world. These antibodies are listed in chronological order of publication in Table 1 , together with their unique biochemical and antiviral properties against MERS-CoV infection observed in cell culture and experimental animal models.
